tweets.text: @l1ttleherbert @HSBC @RedIndustries2 Please cut all ties with @RedIndustries2.They run the most complained about landfill to @EnvAgency,breached their environment permit 5 times and are polluting the area so badly that we need air purifiers to sleep. Air pollution is well above WHO health guidelines. #stopthestink👇 https://t.co/9eSd3faDRj

Concerned about #microplastics - take a look at this from our #PreventingPlasticPollution colleagues at the @EnvAgency 
#freshwater #BringingRiversToLife https://t.co/wTzIhDv9vr

For years many people have suffered who live very close to the landfill, we all became aware of that as the LFG went out of control September 2020 to an even greater extent!
We are now United to stop the stink in our homes, gardens & way of life!
The communities became One again!
@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids I don’t understand how the EA are still debating this? Our homes smell and people are ill. It’s simple, close it down#stopthestink

tweets.text:
Flood Alerts for River Hull Central and Lower River Hull have now been removed following this evening's high tide at 4.3m at 7.30 pm.

Earlier issues with the operation of the Hull Tidal Barrier have now been fully resolved ahead of further high tides tomorrow.

#FloodAware https://t.co/7ZNq4UzOVu

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Wish I had done one too, it's a living hell, never knowing when the stench will allow us to breathe, to sleep, if they read our reports on a daily basis they would know the torture @RedIndustries2 inflict on us. Affecting my ability to do my job at highest level now #stopthestink

☑  Planned distribution of marking kits 
☑  Helped communities protect their vehicles https://t.co/67QTaK7ekL
